name: Musica Menorquina
description: Musica Menorquina is a traditional folk music genre from the Spanish island of Menorca. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the tambourine, the guitar, and the accordion. The music is often upbeat and lively, and is often accompanied by singing and dancing. It is typically performed at festivals and other celebrations, and is a popular form of entertainment for locals and tourists alike.

name: Euskal Indie
description: Euskal Indie is a genre of music that originated in the Basque Country of Spain. It is a mix of traditional Basque music and modern indie rock. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the txalaparta, alboka, and trikitixa, as well as electric guitars, drums, and synthesizers. The lyrics are often in Basque, and the music is often upbeat and energetic. It is a popular genre in the Basque Country, and has gained some international recognition in recent years.

name: Rap Euskera
description: Rap Euskera is a genre of rap music that originated in the Basque Country of Spain. It is characterized by its use of the Basque language, Euskera, as well as its incorporation of traditional Basque musical elements. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many artists gaining national and international recognition. Rap Euskera is often seen as a form of protest music, with many of its lyrics addressing issues of Basque identity, politics, and culture.

name: Indie Hidrocalido
description: Indie Hidrocalido is a genre of music that originated in Mexico in the late 2000s. It is a blend of indie rock, alternative rock, and Latin American music, with a focus on creating a unique sound that is both melodic and energetic. The genre is characterized by its use of electric guitars, synthesizers, and drum machines, as well as its incorporation of traditional Latin American instruments such as the charango and the quena. Indie Hidrocalido is often described as a mix of indie rock, Latin American music, and electronic music, and is known for its upbeat, danceable sound.

name: Gaita
description: Gaita is a traditional music genre from the northern region of Colombia. It is a type of folk music that is played on a traditional Colombian flute called the gaita. The music is usually accompanied by drums and other percussion instruments. The lyrics of gaita songs often tell stories of love, loss, and the struggles of everyday life. Gaita is a popular genre in Colombia and is often played at festivals and other celebrations.

name: Musica Eletronica Gospel
description: Musica Eletronica Gospel is a genre of music that combines traditional gospel music with electronic music elements. It typically features gospel-style vocals, often with a choir, layered over electronic beats and synthesizers. The genre has been growing in popularity in recent years, with many artists creating their own unique sound by blending gospel and electronic music. Musica Eletronica Gospel is often seen as a way to bring a modern twist to traditional gospel music, while still maintaining its spiritual and uplifting message.

name: Nordnorsk Ponk
description: Nordnorsk Ponk is a genre of music that originated in Northern Norway. It is a mix of punk, rock, and folk music, with a strong emphasis on traditional Norwegian folk music. The genre is characterized by its fast-paced, energetic sound, and often features traditional instruments such as the Hardanger fiddle, the langeleik, and the bukkehorn. Nordnorsk Ponk is often seen as a way to express the unique culture of Northern Norway, and is popular among young people in the region.

name: Men's Choir
description: Men's Choir is a genre of choral music that is performed by a group of male singers. It typically features a cappella singing, with the voices of the singers blending together to create a rich, full sound. The repertoire of Men's Choir music includes traditional hymns, spirituals, folk songs, and classical pieces. It is often performed in churches, schools, and other venues, and is a popular choice for special occasions such as weddings and funerals.

name: Welsh Choir
description: The Welsh Choir music genre is a type of choral music that originated in Wales. It is characterized by its use of four-part harmony and traditional Welsh folk songs. The genre is often performed by a choir of male voices, although female choirs are also common. The music is often accompanied by a harp or piano, and the lyrics are usually in Welsh. The genre has been popular since the 19th century and is still performed today.

name: Cumbia Ecuatoriana
description: Cumbia Ecuatoriana is a popular music genre from Ecuador that combines traditional Andean rhythms with modern electronic music. It is characterized by its upbeat, danceable rhythms and its use of traditional instruments such as the charango, quena, and bombo. It is often accompanied by traditional dances such as the Sanjuanito and the Pasillo. Cumbia Ecuatoriana is popular throughout Latin America and has become a staple of Ecuadorian culture.

name: Bolivian Rock
description: Bolivian Rock is a genre of music that originated in Bolivia in the late 1960s and early 1970s. It is a fusion of traditional Bolivian folk music with elements of rock, jazz, and Latin American rhythms. The genre is characterized by its use of electric guitars, bass, drums, and keyboards, as well as traditional Bolivian instruments such as the charango, quena, and zampoña. Bolivian Rock is often seen as a form of protest music, as it was used to express the frustrations of the Bolivian people during a period of political and economic turmoil. The genre has since evolved to include a variety of styles, from hard rock to funk and reggae.

name: Rap Toscana
description: Rap Toscana is a style of rap music that originated in Tuscany, Italy. It is characterized by its use of traditional Tuscan dialects and its focus on social and political issues. The lyrics often focus on topics such as poverty, immigration, and the struggles of everyday life. The beats are often heavily influenced by traditional Italian music, such as folk and classical music. Rap Toscana is a popular genre in Italy and has been gaining popularity in other parts of the world.

name: Gabonese Pop
description: Gabonese Pop is a genre of music that originated in Gabon, a small country in Central Africa. It is a mix of traditional African music, French pop, and hip-hop. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms, catchy melodies, and a mix of traditional and modern instruments. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, social issues, and politics. Popular Gabonese Pop artists include Patience Dabany, Movaizhaleine, and M'Voutou.

name: Dutch Contemporary Classical
description: Dutch Contemporary Classical music is a genre of classical music that is rooted in the traditional classical music of the Netherlands, but with a modern twist. It is characterized by its use of modern instruments, such as synthesizers, electric guitars, and drum machines, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres, such as jazz, rock, and electronic music. It often features complex rhythms and harmonies, and is often experimental in nature. Dutch Contemporary Classical music is often seen as a bridge between traditional classical music and modern music, and is often used in film and television soundtracks.

name: Hangoskonyvek
description: Hangoskonyvek is a genre of Hungarian music that combines traditional folk music with modern electronic elements. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the cimbalom, violins, and accordion, as well as modern synthesizers and drum machines. The genre is often used to create a unique and modern sound that is both traditional and modern at the same time. It is often used in film soundtracks and television shows, as well as in live performances.

name: Musica Sinfonica
description: Musica Sinfonica is a genre of classical music that is typically performed by a large orchestra. It is characterized by its use of complex harmonies, intricate melodies, and dynamic range. It often includes a variety of instruments, including strings, brass, woodwinds, and percussion. Musica Sinfonica is often used to evoke emotion and create a sense of grandeur and drama. It is often used in film scores, operas, and ballets.

name: Zambian Pop
description: Zambian Pop is a genre of music that originated in Zambia in the late 1990s. It is a fusion of traditional Zambian music with elements of hip hop, R&B, and Afrobeat. The genre is characterized by its upbeat rhythms, catchy hooks, and melodic vocals. Zambian Pop is often seen as a way to bridge the gap between traditional and modern music in Zambia. It is popular among both young and old, and is often used to celebrate special occasions such as weddings and birthdays.

name: Folklore Venezolano
description: Folklore Venezolano is a genre of traditional Venezuelan music that is rooted in the country's rich cultural heritage. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the cuatro, maracas, and tambora, as well as its incorporation of African and Indigenous influences. The genre is often upbeat and lively, and its lyrics often tell stories of Venezuelan culture and history. Folklore Venezolano is a popular genre in Venezuela, and is often performed at festivals and other celebrations.

name: Classic NZ Country
description: Classic NZ Country is a genre of music that originated in New Zealand in the 1950s and 1960s. It is a blend of traditional country music, folk, and bluegrass, with a unique New Zealand twist. It is characterized by its use of acoustic instruments such as the guitar, banjo, mandolin, and fiddle, as well as its focus on storytelling and traditional values. Classic NZ Country is often upbeat and cheerful, and its lyrics often focus on rural life, love, and the beauty of the New Zealand landscape. It is a genre that is still popular today, and is often performed at festivals and other events.

name: Pop Minang
description: Pop Minang is a popular music genre from the Minangkabau region of West Sumatra, Indonesia. It is a blend of traditional Minangkabau music with modern pop music, and is characterized by its upbeat tempo and catchy melodies. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, family, and patriotism. Pop Minang is often performed with traditional instruments such as the gendang (drum), rebab (fiddle), and gong, as well as modern instruments such as electric guitars and keyboards. It is a popular genre in Indonesia and is often heard in clubs, radio stations, and on television.

name: Canti Alpini
description: Canti Alpini is a genre of traditional Italian folk music that originated in the Alps. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the accordion, mandolin, and guitar, as well as its use of traditional vocal styles. The lyrics of Canti Alpini songs often tell stories of the lives of the people living in the Alps, and the music is often used to celebrate special occasions such as weddings and festivals.

name: Peruvian Death Metal
description: Peruvian Death Metal is a subgenre of extreme metal music that originated in Peru in the late 1980s. It is characterized by its fast tempos, aggressive guitar riffs, and often dark and morbid lyrical themes. The genre is heavily influenced by thrash metal, death metal, and black metal, and is often characterized by its use of blast beats and guttural vocals. Peruvian Death Metal bands often incorporate traditional Peruvian instruments and rhythms into their music, creating a unique and distinct sound.

name: Bodo Pop
description: Bodo Pop is a genre of music that originated in the Bodo region of India. It is a fusion of traditional Bodo folk music and modern pop music. It is characterized by its upbeat tempo, catchy melodies, and use of traditional Bodo instruments such as the dhol, flute, and drums. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, nature, and traditional Bodo culture. Bodo Pop has become increasingly popular in recent years, and is now a staple of the Indian music scene.

name: Metal Cristao
description: Metal Cristao is a subgenre of heavy metal music that incorporates Christian themes and lyrics. It is often characterized by aggressive guitar riffs, double-bass drumming, and powerful vocals. The lyrics typically focus on themes of faith, hope, and redemption, and often draw from the Bible and other Christian texts. Metal Cristao is popular in Brazil, where it has been embraced by both Christian and secular audiences.

name: Musicas Espiritas
description: Musicas Espiritas is a genre of Brazilian music that is based on spiritual themes. It is often characterized by its use of traditional Brazilian instruments such as the cavaquinho, pandeiro, and berimbau, as well as its incorporation of African rhythms and melodies. The lyrics of Musicas Espiritas often focus on themes of faith, hope, and love, and the music is often used in religious ceremonies and gatherings. It is a popular genre in Brazil, and has been gaining popularity in other countries as well.

name: Keroncong
description: Keroncong is a traditional Indonesian music genre that originated in the 16th century. It is characterized by its slow tempo and gentle, melodic sound. It is usually performed on a variety of instruments, including the ukulele, guitar, violin, flute, and mandolin. The lyrics are often in the Malay language, and the songs often tell stories of love and longing. Keroncong is often seen as a romantic and nostalgic genre, and is popular among both young and old.

name: Maghreb
description: Maghreb music is a genre of music originating from the Maghreb region of North Africa, which includes Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, and Libya. It is a mix of traditional Arabic, Berber, and Andalusian music, and is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the oud, qanun, and nay. It is often accompanied by traditional dances such as the debka and the dahiya. Maghreb music is often upbeat and lively, and is often used in celebrations and weddings.

name: Tuna Estudiantil
description: Tuna Estudiantil is a traditional Spanish music genre that originated in the 16th century. It is typically performed by a group of students, usually from a university, and is characterized by its upbeat, lively rhythms and melodies. The instruments used in Tuna Estudiantil are typically guitars, mandolins, lutes, and tambourines. The lyrics of the songs are often humorous and lighthearted, and often focus on student life and university culture. Tuna Estudiantil is a popular genre in Spain and Latin America, and is often performed at university events and festivals.

name: German Rockabilly
description: German Rockabilly is a style of rock and roll music that originated in Germany in the 1950s. It is a fusion of traditional rockabilly, country, and swing music with a German twist. The genre is characterized by its upbeat tempo, twangy guitars, and a heavy emphasis on the bass. It often features a mix of German and English lyrics, and is often sung in a German dialect. German Rockabilly is often seen as a precursor to the punk and new wave movements of the 1970s and 1980s.

name: Kazakh Hip Hop
description: Kazakh Hip Hop is a genre of music that originated in Kazakhstan in the early 2000s. It is a fusion of traditional Kazakh music with elements of hip hop, rap, and R&B. The lyrics often focus on themes of social and political issues, as well as the struggles of everyday life. Kazakh Hip Hop has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many artists gaining international recognition.

name: Oberkrainer
description: Oberkrainer is a traditional folk music genre from the Slovenian region of Upper Carniola (Oberkrain). It is a type of polka music, characterized by its fast tempo and lively rhythms. The music is usually played on a variety of traditional instruments, including the accordion, clarinet, trumpet, trombone, and double bass. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, nature, and nostalgia. Oberkrainer music is popular in Slovenia and other parts of Central and Eastern Europe, and has been gaining popularity in the United States in recent years.

name: Marcha Funebre
description: Marcha Funebre is a type of funeral march music that originated in Latin America. It is typically played during funerals and other solemn occasions. It is characterized by a slow tempo, a solemn melody, and a somber mood. The music is often performed by a brass band or a string ensemble, and it typically includes a variety of instruments such as trumpets, trombones, tubas, and strings. The music is often accompanied by a choir singing hymns or other religious songs.

name: Marimba
description: Marimba music is a genre of music that originated in Central America and is characterized by its use of the marimba, a percussion instrument that is similar to a xylophone. It is typically played in a fast-paced, upbeat style and often features complex rhythms and melodies. Marimba music is often used in traditional dances and celebrations, and is also popular in Latin American countries.

name: Italian Contemporary Classical
description: Italian Contemporary Classical music is a genre of classical music that combines traditional classical music with modern elements. It is often characterized by its use of modern instruments, such as electric guitars, synthesizers, and drum machines, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres, such as jazz, rock, and world music. It is often characterized by its use of complex rhythms and harmonies, as well as its focus on improvisation and experimentation. It is a genre that is constantly evolving, and is often seen as a bridge between traditional and modern classical music.

name: Trombone Brasileiro
description: Trombone Brasileiro is a style of Brazilian music that combines traditional trombone playing with elements of Brazilian music such as samba, bossa nova, and choro. It is characterized by its use of improvisation, syncopation, and complex rhythms. The trombone is often used to create a melodic line that is then accompanied by other instruments such as guitar, bass, and percussion. The style is often used in jazz, funk, and other popular music genres.

name: Yiddish Folk
description: Yiddish Folk music is a genre of traditional Jewish music that originated in Eastern Europe. It is characterized by its use of minor keys, complex rhythms, and a wide range of vocal styles. It is often performed in a call-and-response style, with a soloist singing a line and the chorus responding. Yiddish Folk music is often used to tell stories, express emotions, and celebrate Jewish holidays. It is a vibrant and living tradition that continues to be performed and enjoyed today.

name: Doomgaze
description: Doomgaze is a subgenre of shoegaze and doom metal that combines the dreamy, ethereal sound of shoegaze with the heavy, distorted guitars and slow tempos of doom metal. It is characterized by its heavy, distorted guitar riffs, slow tempos, and dreamy, ethereal soundscapes. The genre often features a mix of clean and distorted guitars, layered with reverb and delay effects, and often incorporates elements of post-rock and ambient music. The lyrics are often introspective and melancholic, and the vocals are often low in the mix.

name: Chilean Metal
description: Chilean Metal is a subgenre of heavy metal music that originated in Chile in the late 1980s. It is characterized by its aggressive sound, often featuring fast tempos, distorted guitars, and harsh vocals. It is heavily influenced by thrash metal, death metal, and black metal, as well as traditional Chilean folk music. Chilean Metal bands often incorporate Latin American rhythms and instruments into their music, creating a unique and powerful sound. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with bands such as Pentagram, Criminal, and Los Natas gaining international recognition.

name: Banda Caliente
description: Banda Caliente is a Mexican music genre that combines traditional Mexican music with modern pop and rock influences. It is characterized by its fast-paced rhythms, brass instruments, and a heavy emphasis on the accordion. It is often performed by large ensembles of musicians, and is popular in both Mexico and the United States.

name: Spanish Baroque
description: Spanish Baroque music is a style of music that originated in Spain during the 17th and 18th centuries. It is characterized by its ornate and often complex melodic and harmonic structures, as well as its use of instruments such as the guitar, harpsichord, and organ. Spanish Baroque music often features a strong rhythmic drive, and is often highly ornamented. It is also known for its use of counterpoint and its frequent use of dance forms such as the minuet and the sarabande.

name: Balkan Beats
description: Balkan Beats is a genre of music that originated in the Balkans region of Europe. It is a fusion of traditional Balkan folk music with modern electronic music, often incorporating elements of hip-hop, reggae, and other genres. It is characterized by its upbeat, energetic sound and its use of traditional Balkan instruments such as the accordion, clarinet, and tambura. Balkan Beats has become popular in clubs and festivals around the world, and is often used in film and television soundtracks.

name: Alphorn
description: Alphorn music is a traditional genre of music from the Alpine regions of Europe. It is typically played on a long wooden horn, known as an alphorn, and is characterized by its deep, resonant sound. The music is often used to accompany traditional folk dances, and is often played in a call-and-response style between two or more players. Alphorn music is often associated with the Swiss Alps, but is also popular in other Alpine regions such as Austria, Germany, and Italy.

name: Plugg
description: Plugg is a genre of electronic music that combines elements of hip-hop, trap, and dubstep. It is characterized by heavy basslines, distorted synths, and hard-hitting drums. Plugg often features vocal samples and chopped-up vocal hooks, as well as a variety of sound effects. The genre is often associated with the underground music scene and is popular among producers and DJs.

name: Ruta Destroy
description: Ruta Destroy is a genre of music that originated in Mexico City in the early 2000s. It is a mix of punk, ska, reggae, and hip-hop, and is characterized by its fast-paced, energetic sound. The lyrics often focus on social issues, such as poverty, inequality, and injustice. The genre has become increasingly popular in Mexico and Latin America, and has been embraced by a new generation of young people who are looking for a way to express their frustrations and concerns.

name: Disney Portugues
description: Disney Portugues is a genre of music that combines traditional Portuguese music with Disney-style melodies and lyrics. It is often characterized by upbeat, cheerful tunes and lyrics that are often adapted from classic Disney films. The genre is popular among children and adults alike, and is often used in television shows, movies, and commercials.

name: Metal Baiano
description: Metal Baiano is a heavy metal music genre that originated in the Brazilian state of Bahia. It is characterized by its fast tempos, aggressive guitar riffs, and powerful vocal delivery. The genre is heavily influenced by traditional Brazilian rhythms and melodies, as well as by the thrash metal and death metal genres. Metal Baiano is often seen as a fusion of traditional Brazilian music and heavy metal, and is popular among metal fans in Brazil and abroad.

name: Deep Latin Jazz
description: Deep Latin Jazz is a genre of jazz music that combines traditional Latin American rhythms and instruments with jazz improvisation. It is characterized by a heavy emphasis on percussion, often featuring congas, bongos, timbales, and other Latin percussion instruments. The music also often incorporates elements of Afro-Cuban music, such as clave and guajeo, as well as other Latin American styles such as salsa and bossa nova. Deep Latin Jazz is often characterized by a slower tempo and a more relaxed feel than other jazz genres.

name: Psalmen
description: The Psalmen genre is a type of Dutch religious music that originated in the 16th century. It is a form of choral music that is based on the biblical Psalms and is usually sung in a four-part harmony. The music is typically performed in churches and is often accompanied by an organ. The Psalmen genre is characterized by its simple, yet beautiful melodies and its use of traditional Dutch folk instruments such as the lute, harp, and flute.

name: Moroccan Traditional
description: Moroccan Traditional music is a genre of music that is rooted in the traditional music of Morocco. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the oud, qanun, and nay, as well as its use of traditional rhythms and melodies. It is often accompanied by traditional dances such as the Aarfa and the Ahidous. The music is often used to celebrate special occasions such as weddings, births, and religious holidays. It is also used to express emotions such as joy, sorrow, and love.

name: Nu Electro
description: Nu Electro is a genre of electronic music that combines elements of electro, hip-hop, and funk. It is characterized by its heavy use of synthesizers, drum machines, and samples, as well as its upbeat, danceable rhythms. Nu Electro often features a variety of vocal styles, ranging from rap to singing. It is often seen as a modern take on classic electro and funk music, and is popular in clubs and on the radio.

name: Musica Caririense
description: Musica Caririense is a traditional folk music genre from the Cariri region of northeastern Brazil. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and lively instrumentation, which often includes accordion, guitar, and drums. The lyrics often tell stories of the region's history and culture, and the music is often accompanied by traditional dances. Musica Caririense is a popular genre in the region, and is often performed at festivals and other celebrations.

name: Polish Free Jazz
description: Polish Free Jazz is a style of jazz music that originated in Poland in the late 1960s and early 1970s. It is characterized by its improvisational nature, often incorporating elements of traditional Polish folk music, as well as avant-garde and experimental techniques. The music is often characterized by its use of extended techniques, such as multiphonics, extended range instruments, and extended techniques on traditional instruments. It is also known for its use of extended forms, such as free improvisation, collective improvisation, and free composition. Polish Free Jazz is often seen as a reaction to the more traditional forms of jazz, and is seen as a way to explore new musical possibilities.

name: Musica Wixarika
description: Musica Wixarika is a traditional music genre from the Wixarika people of Mexico. It is a blend of traditional Wixarika music and modern influences, and is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the jarana, the guitar, and the violin. The music is often accompanied by traditional Wixarika dance and is used to celebrate important events and rituals. Musica Wixarika is a vibrant and lively genre that is deeply rooted in the culture of the Wixarika people.

name: Brazilian Grindcore
description: Brazilian Grindcore is a subgenre of extreme metal music that originated in Brazil in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its fast tempos, aggressive guitar riffs, and blast beats. The lyrics often focus on social and political issues, and the music is often heavily distorted and chaotic. It is a fusion of grindcore, death metal, and hardcore punk, and is often considered to be one of the most extreme forms of metal music.

name: Deep Northern Soul
description: Deep Northern Soul is a subgenre of Northern Soul, a genre of soul music that originated in the northern parts of England in the late 1960s. Deep Northern Soul is characterized by its slower tempo, more intense vocal delivery, and more complex arrangements than traditional Northern Soul. It is often characterized by its heavy use of horns, strings, and other orchestral instruments. Deep Northern Soul is often seen as a more mature and sophisticated version of Northern Soul, and is often seen as a bridge between traditional soul music and modern R&B.

name: Orquesta Tropical
description: Orquesta Tropical is a style of Latin music that originated in Cuba in the early 20th century. It is a combination of Cuban son, mambo, and cha-cha-cha, and is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and lively melodies. The music is typically performed by a large ensemble, including brass, strings, and percussion instruments. The style is often associated with the Cuban dance style of the same name, and is popular in Latin American countries, as well as in the United States.

name: Musica Hondurena
description: Musica Hondurena is a genre of music that originated in Honduras. It is a mix of traditional Honduran folk music, Latin American rhythms, and modern pop music. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and catchy melodies. It often features a variety of instruments, including guitars, drums, and marimbas. Musica Hondurena is popular throughout Central America and is often used in festivals and celebrations. It is a vibrant and lively genre of music that is sure to get people dancing.

name: Punta Rock
description: Punta Rock is a genre of music that originated in Belize in the late 1970s. It is a fusion of traditional Garifuna music, reggae, and calypso. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and lyrics that often focus on social and political issues. The instrumentation typically includes drums, bass, guitar, and percussion. The lyrics are usually sung in English, Spanish, and Garifuna. Punta Rock is popular throughout Central America and the Caribbean.

name: Combos Nacionales
description: Combos Nacionales is a genre of music that originated in Colombia in the 1950s. It is a fusion of traditional Colombian folk music with jazz, swing, and other Latin American styles. The genre is characterized by its upbeat rhythms, improvisation, and use of traditional instruments such as the tiple, cuatro, and maracas. Combos Nacionales is often performed in a live setting, with musicians playing together in a group. It is a popular genre in Colombia and is often used in festivals and other celebrations.

name: Reggae Mexicano
description: Reggae Mexicano is a fusion of traditional Mexican music and reggae. It combines the upbeat rhythms of reggae with the traditional sounds of Mexican music, such as mariachi, cumbia, and ranchera. The genre is characterized by its use of horns, guitars, and percussion instruments, as well as its incorporation of traditional Mexican lyrics and melodies. Reggae Mexicano is popular in Mexico and other Latin American countries, and has been gaining popularity in the United States in recent years.

name: Bohemian Baroque
description: Bohemian Baroque is a genre of classical music that originated in the Czech Republic in the late 17th century. It is characterized by its ornate, intricate melodies and rhythms, often featuring multiple voices and instruments. It is often seen as a combination of the Baroque and Rococo styles, with a focus on the use of counterpoint and polyphony. Bohemian Baroque music is often seen as a precursor to the Classical period, and is still performed today in many parts of the world.

name: Aggro Chileno
description: Aggro Chileno is a genre of Chilean hip hop music that emerged in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its aggressive and confrontational lyrics, often dealing with themes of poverty, violence, and social injustice. The music is typically fast-paced and heavily influenced by reggaeton, rap, and trap. It is often accompanied by a heavy bass line and synthesized sounds. Aggro Chileno is popular among young people in Chile and has become a symbol of the country's struggle against inequality and oppression.

name: Musica Roraimense
description: Musica Roraimense is a genre of music from the Brazilian state of Roraima. It is a mix of traditional Brazilian rhythms, such as samba and forro, with influences from the indigenous cultures of the region. The music is often characterized by its upbeat tempo and lively instrumentation, featuring drums, guitars, and other traditional Brazilian instruments. Lyrics often focus on themes of love, nature, and the culture of the region. Musica Roraimense is popular throughout Brazil and is often performed at festivals and other events.

name: Trio Cubano
description: Trio Cubano is a style of Cuban music that originated in the late 19th century. It is characterized by a three-piece ensemble consisting of a guitar, tres (a Cuban guitar-like instrument) and a marímbula (a Cuban bass instrument). The music is usually upbeat and lively, and often features improvisation. It is often used in Cuban dance music, such as the rumba and son.

name: Vintage Tango
description: Vintage Tango is a style of tango music that originated in Argentina and Uruguay in the early 20th century. It is characterized by its passionate, romantic melodies and its intricate rhythms. It is often performed with a small ensemble of instruments, such as the bandoneon, violin, guitar, and piano. The lyrics of vintage tango songs often tell stories of love, loss, and longing.

name: Italo Beats
description: Italo Beats is a genre of electronic music that originated in Italy in the late 1970s and early 1980s. It is characterized by its use of synthesizers, drum machines, and vocoders, as well as its melodic, upbeat sound. Italo Beats often incorporates elements of disco, funk, and pop music, and is often seen as a precursor to the modern EDM and house music genres. It is often associated with the Italo Disco movement, which was popular in Italy during the 1980s.

name: Rock Abc Paulista
description: Rock ABC Paulista is a style of Brazilian rock music that originated in the city of São Paulo in the late 1970s. It is characterized by its heavy use of electric guitars, synthesizers, and drum machines, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres such as funk, soul, and reggae. The lyrics often focus on themes of social and political issues, as well as love and relationships. The genre has been influential in the development of other Brazilian rock styles such as MPB and samba rock.

name: Turkce Kadin Rap
description: Turkce Kadin Rap is a genre of Turkish hip-hop music that focuses on female empowerment and social issues. name: Wandelweiser

name: Folklore Panameno
description: Folklore Panameno is a genre of traditional Panamanian music that is rooted in the country's indigenous and Afro-Caribbean cultures. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as marimbas, drums, and guitars, as well as its incorporation of Spanish and African influences. The genre is often used to celebrate important events and holidays, and is often accompanied by traditional dances. Folklore Panameno is a vibrant and lively genre that is beloved by many Panamanians.

name: Slovak Punk
description: Slovak Punk is a genre of punk rock music that originated in Slovakia in the late 1980s. It is characterized by its fast-paced, aggressive sound and often political lyrics. The genre is heavily influenced by British and American punk rock, as well as traditional Slovak folk music. Slovak Punk bands often incorporate traditional Slovak instruments such as the fujara, a type of flute, and the gajdy, a type of bagpipe, into their music. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with bands such as The Plastic People of the Universe, The Prostitutes, and The Paranoid gaining international recognition.

name: Burundian Traditional
description: Burundian traditional music is a genre of music that is rooted in the culture and history of Burundi. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as drums, flutes, and xylophones, as well as its use of vocal harmonies and call-and-response singing. The music is often used to celebrate important events such as weddings, funerals, and other important occasions. It is also used to tell stories and express emotions. Burundian traditional music is often accompanied by traditional dances, which are often performed in a circle.

name: Antilliaanse Folklore
description: Antilliaanse Folklore is a genre of music from the Caribbean islands of Aruba, Bonaire, and Curaçao. It is a mix of African, Latin, and European influences, and is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and lively melodies. The genre is often performed with traditional instruments such as the tambu, the kwint, and the kalimba. It is often accompanied by singing and dancing, and is a popular form of entertainment at festivals and other celebrations.

name: Turkmen Pop
description: Turkmen Pop is a genre of music that originated in Turkmenistan in the late 1990s. It is a mix of traditional Turkmen folk music and modern pop music, and is characterized by its upbeat, danceable rhythms and catchy melodies. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, patriotism, and national pride. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, and is now widely heard in Turkmenistan and other Central Asian countries.

name: Kinderliedjies
description: Kinderliedjies is a genre of music from South Africa that is specifically designed for children. It is typically upbeat and cheerful, and often includes lyrics about animals, nature, and other topics that are of interest to children. The music is often accompanied by simple, repetitive melodies and rhythms that are easy for children to follow. Kinderliedjies is a popular genre of music in South Africa, and is often used in schools and other educational settings to help children learn.

name: Metal Paraguayo
description: Metal Paraguayo is a heavy metal music genre that originated in Paraguay in the late 1980s. It is characterized by its aggressive sound, fast tempos, and distorted guitars. The lyrics often focus on social and political issues, as well as themes of rebellion and freedom. The genre has been influenced by a variety of metal subgenres, including thrash metal, death metal, and black metal. It is also known for its use of traditional Paraguayan instruments, such as the charango and the bombo. Metal Paraguayo has become increasingly popular in recent years, with bands such as Los Natas, Los Espiritus, and Los Pibes del Metal gaining international recognition.

name: Neru
description: Neru is a genre of Japanese music that combines elements of hip-hop, R&B, and electronic music. It is characterized by its upbeat, danceable beats and its use of synthesizers and samples. It often features rap-style vocals and incorporates elements of traditional Japanese music. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many artists releasing albums and singles in the style.

name: Liberian Pop
description: Liberian Pop is a genre of music that originated in Liberia in the late 1980s. It is a fusion of traditional African music, reggae, hip hop, and R&B. The genre is characterized by its upbeat rhythms, catchy hooks, and positive messages. It is often used to promote peace and unity in the country. Liberian Pop is popular among both young and old, and is often used in political campaigns and other public events.

name: Afrikaans Folk
description: Afrikaans Folk is a genre of music that originated in South Africa. It is a blend of traditional African music, European folk music, and local South African styles. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the kora, mbira, and marimba, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres such as jazz, reggae, and hip-hop. The lyrics are often in Afrikaans, a language spoken in South Africa, and the music is often upbeat and celebratory. Afrikaans Folk is a popular genre in South Africa and is often used to celebrate special occasions such as weddings and other celebrations.

name: Alternative Hardcore
description: Alternative Hardcore is a genre of music that combines elements of hardcore punk, metalcore, and alternative rock. It is characterized by aggressive, distorted guitar riffs, fast tempos, and screamed or shouted vocals. The lyrics often focus on social and political issues, and the music often has a dark and intense atmosphere. It is a genre that has been growing in popularity since the early 2000s, and is often associated with the post-hardcore and metalcore genres.

name: New Jersey Underground Rap
description: New Jersey Underground Rap is a subgenre of hip hop music that originated in the state of New Jersey. It is characterized by its hard-hitting beats, aggressive lyrics, and often dark and gritty subject matter. The genre is heavily influenced by East Coast hip hop, and often features samples from classic soul and funk records. Artists such as Joe Budden, Redman, and Naughty by Nature are some of the most well-known artists associated with the genre.

name: Night Drive Phonk
description: Night Drive Phonk is a subgenre of hip hop and trap music that emerged in the early 2010s. It is characterized by its dark, atmospheric soundscapes, heavy 808 basslines, and distorted synths. The genre often incorporates elements of horrorcore and vaporwave, and is often associated with the "vaporwave aesthetic". It is often used in the context of late night drives, and is often used to create a sense of nostalgia and longing.

name: Draaiorgel
description: Draaiorgel is a Dutch music genre that originated in the early 20th century. It is a type of mechanical organ music, usually played on a street organ or barrel organ. The music is typically upbeat and cheerful, and often features traditional Dutch folk songs. It is often associated with carnivals and fairs, and is a popular form of entertainment in the Netherlands.

name: Shantykoren
description: Shantykoren is a Dutch folk music genre that originated in the 19th century. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as accordions, banjos, and harmonicas, as well as its use of traditional Dutch folk songs. The genre is often associated with the Dutch working class and is often performed in a lively, upbeat style. It is a popular genre in the Netherlands and is often performed at festivals and other events.

name: Touhou
description: Touhou is a Japanese music genre that originated from the popular video game series of the same name. It is characterized by its upbeat, melodic, and often fast-paced sound. Touhou music often features a wide variety of instruments, including traditional Japanese instruments such as the shamisen, as well as synthesizers and electronic drums. The genre is often associated with the "bullet hell" shooter game genre, and many of the songs are used as background music in the games. Touhou music is often seen as a form of "anime music" due to its popularity in the anime community.

name: Venezuelan Metal
description: Venezuelan Metal is a subgenre of heavy metal music that originated in Venezuela in the late 1980s. It is characterized by a mix of traditional heavy metal, thrash metal, and death metal, with influences from Latin American music such as salsa, merengue, and cumbia. The lyrics often focus on social and political issues, and the music is often fast-paced and aggressive. Venezuelan Metal bands often incorporate traditional Venezuelan instruments such as the cuatro, maracas, and tambora into their music.

name: Sambalpuri Pop
description: Sambalpuri Pop is a genre of music that originated in the Indian state of Odisha. It is a fusion of traditional folk music and modern pop music, and is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and catchy melodies. The lyrics are often in the local language, Sambalpuri, and the instruments used are typically traditional Indian instruments such as the harmonium, tabla, and dholak. Sambalpuri Pop is popular among the youth of Odisha and has become a popular genre of music in India.

name: Latin American Baroque
description: Latin American Baroque music is a genre of music that originated in the 17th and 18th centuries in Latin America. It is characterized by its ornate and complex polyphonic textures, often featuring multiple voices and instruments. It is heavily influenced by the Baroque music of Europe, but also incorporates elements of indigenous Latin American music, such as the use of native instruments and rhythms. It is often characterized by its use of syncopation, ornamentation, and improvisation.

name: Lo-Fi Product
description: Lo-Fi Product is a genre of music that is characterized by its low-fidelity production values and DIY aesthetic. It often features a lo-fi sound, with a focus on minimalism and experimentation. The genre is often associated with bedroom producers, who use limited equipment and resources to create their music. Lo-Fi Product often incorporates elements of hip-hop, jazz, and ambient music, and is often characterized by its laid-back, relaxed atmosphere.

name: Afrikaans Gospel
description: Afrikaans Gospel is a genre of Christian music that originated in South Africa. It is a blend of traditional African music and Christian hymns, and is often sung in the Afrikaans language. The genre is characterized by its upbeat, joyful sound, and its lyrics often focus on themes of faith, hope, and joy. It is often performed in churches and other religious settings, and is popular among both Afrikaans-speaking and English-speaking South Africans.

name: Punk Tico
description: Punk Tico is a genre of punk rock music that originated in Costa Rica in the late 1990s. It is characterized by its fast-paced, aggressive sound and its lyrics, which often focus on social and political issues. Punk Tico bands often incorporate traditional Latin American instruments such as marimbas and bongos into their sound. The genre has been described as a mix of punk, ska, reggae, and Latin American music. Punk Tico bands have become popular in Costa Rica and have gained international recognition, with some bands touring in Europe and the United States.

name: Barnasogur
description: Barnasogur is a genre of Icelandic folk music that dates back to the 19th century. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the fiddle, accordion, and guitar, as well as its use of traditional Icelandic vocal styles. The music is often upbeat and lively, and is often used for dancing. It is a popular genre in Iceland, and is often performed at festivals and other events.

name: Kikuyu Gospel
description: Kikuyu Gospel is a genre of Christian music that originated in Kenya. It is a blend of traditional African music and Christian hymns, and is often performed in churches and other religious gatherings. The music is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and joyful melodies, and is often accompanied by traditional African instruments such as drums, guitars, and marimbas. The lyrics of Kikuyu Gospel songs are typically focused on praising God and expressing faith in Jesus Christ.

name: Solo Wave
description: Solo Wave is a genre of music that is characterized by its minimalist, lo-fi sound. It is often instrumental and incorporates elements of ambient, drone, and experimental music. It is often characterized by its sparse, repetitive melodies and its use of field recordings, found sounds, and other unconventional sound sources. Solo Wave is often seen as a form of escapism, providing a space for contemplation and introspection.

name: Igbo Worship
description: Igbo Worship is a genre of Christian music that originated in the Igbo people of Nigeria. It is characterized by its use of traditional Igbo instruments such as the udu, oja, and ogene, as well as its incorporation of traditional Igbo rhythms and melodies. Igbo Worship music is often sung in Igbo language and is used in churches and other religious gatherings. It is a vibrant and uplifting style of music that is often used to praise God and to express joy and gratitude.

name: Boeremusiek
description: Boeremusiek is a traditional South African folk music genre that originated in the rural areas of the country. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and melodies, often featuring accordion, guitar, banjo, and fiddle. The lyrics are usually in Afrikaans and often tell stories of rural life and the struggles of the Boer people. Boeremusiek is often performed at festivals and other events, and is a popular form of entertainment in South Africa.

name: Czech Hardcore
description: Czech Hardcore is a style of hardcore punk music that originated in the Czech Republic in the late 1980s. It is characterized by fast tempos, aggressive vocals, and distorted guitars. The lyrics often focus on social and political issues, and the music is often seen as a form of protest. Czech Hardcore bands often incorporate elements of other genres such as thrash metal, crust punk, and grindcore. The genre has been influential in the development of other genres such as grindcore and crust punk.

name: Animal Singing
description: Animal Singing is a genre of music that features the sounds of animals, such as birds, frogs, and other creatures, as the main instrumentation. It is often used to create a calming and peaceful atmosphere, and can be used to evoke a sense of nature and the outdoors. Animal Singing can be found in many different styles, from traditional folk music to modern electronic music.

name: Deep Deep Tech House
description: Deep Deep Tech House is a subgenre of Tech House that is characterized by its dark, hypnotic, and atmospheric sound. It typically features a 4/4 beat, deep basslines, and minimal percussion. It often incorporates elements of other genres such as Dub, Techno, and Trance. Deep Deep Tech House is often used in underground clubs and festivals, and is popular among DJs and producers.

name: Aesthetic Rap
description: Aesthetic Rap is a subgenre of hip hop that focuses on creating a unique and artistic sound. It is characterized by its use of abstract and experimental production techniques, often incorporating elements of jazz, soul, and ambient music. Lyrically, Aesthetic Rap often focuses on themes of introspection, self-reflection, and personal growth. Artists in this genre often strive to create a unique and artistic sound that stands out from the mainstream.

name: Tropical Alternativo
description: Tropical Alternativo is a genre of Latin music that combines traditional Latin rhythms with alternative rock, punk, and ska influences. It is characterized by its upbeat, energetic sound and its incorporation of elements from a variety of genres. It often features heavy use of electric guitars, synthesizers, and drum machines, as well as traditional Latin instruments such as maracas, bongos, and congas. The lyrics often focus on social and political issues, and the music is often used as a form of protest.

name: Musique Traditionnelle Comorienne
description: Musique Traditionnelle Comorienne is a traditional music genre from the Comoros Islands, located off the east coast of Africa. It is a mix of African, Arabic, and Indian influences, and is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the lute, drums, and flutes. The music is often accompanied by singing and dancing, and is used to celebrate special occasions such as weddings and religious festivals. It is a vibrant and lively genre that is still popular today.

name: Nagpuri Pop
description: Nagpuri Pop is a genre of music that originated in the Indian state of Jharkhand. It is a fusion of traditional folk music and modern pop music, and is characterized by its upbeat, danceable rhythms and catchy melodies. The lyrics are often in the local language, Nagpuri, and the instruments used are typically traditional Indian instruments such as the dholak, tabla, and harmonium. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, and is often heard at weddings and other celebrations.

name: Zenonesque
description: Zenonesque is a subgenre of psychedelic trance music that is characterized by its fast-paced, energetic sound and its focus on complex, intricate melodies. It is often characterized by its use of complex, layered melodies and its focus on creating a hypnotic, trance-like atmosphere. It is often associated with the psytrance scene in Europe, particularly in Germany and the Netherlands. It is also known for its use of complex, layered percussion and its focus on creating a psychedelic atmosphere.

name: Pashto Pop
description: Pashto Pop is a genre of music that originated in the Pashtun culture of Afghanistan and Pakistan. It is a mix of traditional Pashtun folk music and modern pop music, and is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and catchy melodies. The lyrics of Pashto Pop songs often focus on themes of love, patriotism, and social issues. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many artists gaining international recognition.

name: Glitchbreak
description: Glitchbreak is a genre of electronic music that combines elements of breakbeat, glitch, and drum and bass. It is characterized by its fast-paced, syncopated rhythms, heavy basslines, and intricate sound design. Glitchbreak often incorporates elements of hip-hop, dubstep, and other genres, creating a unique and energetic sound. It is often used in video game soundtracks and is popular among DJs and producers.

name: Slushwave
description: Slushwave is a genre of music that combines elements of dream pop, chillwave, and synthwave. It is characterized by its dreamy, ethereal soundscapes, often featuring lush synths, hazy guitars, and airy vocals. The genre is often associated with a nostalgic, retro-futuristic aesthetic, and its sound is often described as “hazy” and “ethereal”. Slushwave is often seen as a more laid-back, relaxed version of synthwave, and its sound is often compared to that of vaporwave.

name: Dreampunk
description: Dreampunk is a genre of music that combines elements of hip-hop, funk, and electronic music. It is characterized by its heavy use of synthesizers, drum machines, and samples, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres such as jazz, soul, and rock. The genre is often associated with the production style of Dr. Dre, who is credited with pioneering the sound. Dreampunk is often seen as a fusion of hip-hop and electronic music, and is often characterized by its upbeat, energetic sound.

name: Canto A Tenore
description: Canto A Tenore is a traditional polyphonic singing style from Sardinia, Italy. It is characterized by four male voices singing in harmony, with each voice taking a different part. The four voices are known as bassu, mesu oche, contra and boghe. The bassu is the lowest voice, the mesu oche is the highest voice, the contra is the middle voice, and the boghe is the lead voice. The singing is usually accompanied by a frame drum, and the lyrics are often improvised. Canto A Tenore is a form of traditional music that has been passed down through generations, and is still practiced today.

name: Romanian Contemporary Classical
description: Romanian Contemporary Classical music is a genre of classical music that has been influenced by the traditional folk music of Romania. It is characterized by its use of traditional Romanian instruments, such as the cimbalom, and its incorporation of elements from other genres, such as jazz and rock. It is often characterized by its use of complex rhythms and harmonies, as well as its use of extended techniques, such as glissandi and microtones. It is a genre that is constantly evolving, and is often seen as a bridge between traditional and modern music.

name: Sad Lo-Fi
description: Sad Lo-Fi is a genre of music that combines elements of lo-fi hip hop and sadcore. It typically features slow, melancholic beats, often with samples of old jazz, soul, and R&B records. The lyrics are often introspective and reflective, and the overall sound is often dreamy and nostalgic.

name: Guatemalan Metal
description: Guatemalan Metal is a subgenre of heavy metal music that originated in Guatemala in the late 1990s. It is characterized by a mix of traditional heavy metal and Latin American influences, such as marimba, cumbia, and salsa. The genre is known for its aggressive sound and often incorporates elements of thrash metal, death metal, and black metal. Lyrics often focus on social and political issues, as well as themes of violence and death. Guatemalan Metal bands include: Infierno, Kulto Maldito, and Xibalba.

name: Russian Drain
description: Russian Drain is a genre of electronic music that originated in Russia in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its dark, melancholic sound, often featuring distorted synths, heavy bass, and a slow tempo. The genre is heavily influenced by industrial and gothic music, as well as Russian folk music. It is often associated with the Russian underground music scene and has been described as a "darker, more aggressive version of trip-hop".

name: Afghan Rap
description: Afghan Rap is a genre of hip-hop music that originated in Afghanistan in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its use of traditional Afghan instruments, such as the tabla and the rubab, as well as its incorporation of traditional Afghan melodies and rhythms. The lyrics of Afghan Rap often focus on themes of social justice, politics, and the struggles of everyday life in Afghanistan. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many Afghan rappers gaining international recognition.

name: Nadaswaram
description: Nadaswaram is a traditional South Indian classical music genre that is played on a double reed wind instrument of the same name. It is usually accompanied by a pair of drums called thavil. The music is characterized by its fast-paced, high-pitched, and energetic sound. It is often used in temple ceremonies and festivals, as well as in Carnatic music concerts. The nadaswaram is also used in film soundtracks and other popular music genres.

name: Musica Michoacana
description: Musica Michoacana is a traditional Mexican music genre that originated in the state of Michoacan. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and cheerful melodies, often featuring instruments such as the guitar, accordion, and violin. The lyrics often tell stories of love, loss, and everyday life in Michoacan. Musica Michoacana is popular throughout Mexico and is often performed at festivals and celebrations.

name: Vanuatu Music
description: Vanuatu Music is a genre of music that originated in the South Pacific island nation of Vanuatu. It is a mix of traditional Melanesian music, Polynesian music, and contemporary styles. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the slit drum, bamboo flute, and nose flute, as well as modern instruments like the guitar and keyboard. The music is often upbeat and celebratory, and is often used in traditional ceremonies and festivals. It is also popular in the tourist industry, and is often used in resorts and hotels.

name: Drill Brasileiro
description: Drill Brasileiro is a Brazilian hip-hop subgenre that originated in the favelas of Rio de Janeiro. It is characterized by its hard-hitting, aggressive beats and lyrics that often focus on themes of crime, violence, and poverty. The genre has been heavily influenced by American drill music, but has its own unique sound and style. It is often characterized by its heavy use of 808 bass drums, snares, and hi-hats, as well as its use of samples from Brazilian funk and samba music.

name: Circassian Folk
description: Circassian Folk music is a traditional genre of music from the Circassian people of the North Caucasus region. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the duduk, zurna, and daire, as well as its use of vocal harmonies and improvisation. The music is often used to accompany traditional Circassian dances, and is often performed at weddings and other celebrations. It is a vibrant and lively style of music that is full of energy and emotion.

name: Bernu Dziesmas
description: Bernu Dziesmas is a traditional Latvian folk music genre that dates back to the 19th century. It is characterized by its simple, repetitive melodies and lyrics that often tell stories of rural life. The music is usually performed by a small ensemble of instruments, such as accordion, violin, and guitar, and is often accompanied by singing. The genre is still popular in Latvia today, and is often performed at festivals and other events.

name: Deutschrock
description: Deutschrock is a German-language rock music genre that originated in the 1970s. It is characterized by its heavy use of electric guitars, synthesizers, and drums, as well as its lyrics, which often focus on social and political issues. It is heavily influenced by punk and new wave music, and is often seen as a more aggressive and political version of the traditional German Schlager music. Popular Deutschrock bands include Die Ärzte, Die Toten Hosen, and Fehlfarben.

name: Magyar Kabare
description: Magyar Kabare is a traditional Hungarian music genre that combines elements of folk music, jazz, and cabaret. It is characterized by its upbeat, lively rhythms and often humorous lyrics. The genre is often performed in small clubs and bars, and is popular among both young and old audiences. It is often accompanied by traditional Hungarian instruments such as the cimbalom, violin, and accordion.

name: Cumbia 420
description: Cumbia 420 is a fusion of traditional cumbia music and reggae, with a modern twist. It is a style of music that originated in Colombia and has since spread to other Latin American countries. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms, heavy bass lines, and a mix of traditional cumbia and reggae sounds. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, partying, and social issues. Cumbia 420 is a popular genre among young people in Latin America and is often played at parties and clubs.

name: Funk Viral
description: Funk Viral is a genre of music that combines elements of funk, hip-hop, and electronic music. It is characterized by its heavy bass lines, syncopated rhythms, and catchy hooks. It often features samples from classic funk and soul records, as well as modern electronic sounds. The genre has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many artists creating their own unique take on the sound.

name: Banda Militar
description: Banda Militar is a style of Mexican music that originated in the late 19th century. It is characterized by its use of brass instruments, such as trumpets, trombones, and tubas, as well as drums and other percussion instruments. The music is often played in a march-like style, and is often used to accompany military parades and other patriotic events. It is also popular at festivals and other celebrations. The lyrics of Banda Militar songs often focus on themes of patriotism, honor, and loyalty.

name: Forest Black Metal
description: Forest Black Metal is a subgenre of black metal that focuses on nature and the environment. It often incorporates elements of folk music, and its lyrics often focus on themes of nature, paganism, and environmentalism. Musically, it is characterized by fast tempos, blast beats, and distorted guitars. It also often features acoustic guitars, keyboards, and synthesizers, as well as traditional folk instruments such as flutes and violins. Forest Black Metal is often seen as a more melodic and atmospheric version of black metal, and its sound is often described as being “atmospheric” and “ethereal”.

name: Boom Bap Espanol
description: Boom Bap Espanol is a fusion genre of hip hop and Latin music that originated in Spain. It combines elements of traditional Latin music such as flamenco, salsa, and reggaeton with hip hop beats and samples. The genre is characterized by its heavy use of samples, often from classic Latin songs, and its incorporation of Latin rhythms and instruments. Boom Bap Espanol is a popular genre in Spain and has been gaining traction in other parts of the world.

name: Rap Canario
description: Rap Canario is a style of rap music that originated in the Canary Islands, a Spanish archipelago off the coast of Morocco. It is characterized by its use of Spanish and Canarian dialects, as well as its incorporation of traditional Canarian musical elements such as flamenco and reggae. The lyrics often focus on social issues, such as immigration, racism, and poverty. Rap Canario has become increasingly popular in recent years, with many artists gaining national and international recognition.

name: Kermis
description: Kermis is a Dutch folk music genre that originated in the Netherlands in the 19th century. It is characterized by its upbeat, cheerful melodies and often features accordion, fiddle, and guitar. The lyrics often tell stories of love, loss, and nostalgia. Kermis music is often played at festivals and fairs, and is a popular genre in the Netherlands.

name: Mallsoft
description: Mallsoft is a genre of music that is inspired by the atmosphere of shopping malls. It typically features ambient, lo-fi, and synthwave elements, and often incorporates samples of mall sounds such as elevator music, announcements, and the hum of air conditioning. The genre is often associated with nostalgia and a sense of longing for the past. Mallsoft is often seen as a form of escapism, allowing the listener to experience the mall in a different way.

name: Cosmic Death Metal
description: Cosmic Death Metal is a subgenre of extreme metal that combines elements of death metal with cosmic and space-themed elements. It typically features fast-paced, aggressive riffs, blast beats, and growled vocals. The lyrics often focus on themes of outer space, science fiction, and the unknown. The music is often heavily distorted and layered with synthesizers and sound effects to create a dark, otherworldly atmosphere.

name: Thai Worship
description: Thai Worship is a genre of Christian music that originated in Thailand. It is a blend of traditional Thai music and contemporary Christian worship music. It is characterized by its use of traditional Thai instruments such as the khaen, a bamboo mouth organ, and the phin, a traditional Thai lute. The lyrics are usually in Thai and focus on praising God and expressing faith. The music is often upbeat and joyful, and is often used in churches and other Christian gatherings.

name: Anime Lo-Fi
description: Anime Lo-Fi is a genre of music that combines elements of traditional Japanese anime music with modern lo-fi hip-hop production. It typically features a combination of melodic, dreamy synths, jazzy samples, and laid-back beats. The genre is often associated with nostalgia and relaxation, and is often used as background music for studying, gaming, and other activities.

name: Mega Funk
description: Mega Funk is a genre of funk music that emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s. It is characterized by its heavy use of synthesizers, drum machines, and electronic instruments, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres such as disco, soul, and jazz. It is often characterized by its upbeat, danceable rhythms and its catchy, melodic hooks. It is also known for its use of funk-inspired bass lines and its incorporation of funk-influenced vocal styles.

name: Yakuza
description: Yakuza music is a genre of Japanese music that originated in the early 20th century. It is characterized by its use of traditional Japanese instruments such as shamisen, koto, and taiko drums, as well as its incorporation of elements from other genres such as jazz, rock, and hip-hop. Yakuza music is often associated with the Yakuza, a Japanese organized crime syndicate, and its lyrics often reflect the lifestyle of the Yakuza. The genre is known for its dramatic and intense sound, and its use of traditional Japanese instruments and melodies.

name: Uma Musume
description: Uma Musume is a genre of music that combines traditional Japanese music with modern pop and rock elements. It is characterized by its upbeat, catchy melodies and its use of traditional Japanese instruments such as the shamisen, koto, and taiko drums. The lyrics often focus on themes of horses, racing, and the joys of being a horse girl. Uma Musume is a popular genre in Japan, and has been gaining traction in the West as well.

name: Chillsynth
description: Chillsynth is a genre of electronic music that combines elements of chillwave, synthwave, and vaporwave. It is characterized by its dreamy, nostalgic soundscapes, often featuring heavily reverbed and distorted synths, as well as samples from 80s and 90s pop culture. It is often associated with a laid-back, chill atmosphere, and its production often utilizes lo-fi techniques.

name: Dancefloor DnB
description: Dancefloor Drum and Bass (DnB) is a subgenre of drum and bass music that is designed for the dancefloor. It is characterized by its fast tempo, heavy basslines, and complex drum patterns. It often incorporates elements of other genres such as hip-hop, dubstep, and house music. It is often used in clubs and festivals, and is popular among ravers and clubbers.

name: Fotbollslatar
description: Fotbollslatar is a Swedish music genre that combines traditional Swedish folk music with modern electronic music. name: Funk Mandelao

It is characterized by its heavy use of electric guitar, synthesizers, and drum machines, as well as its upbeat, danceable rhythms. name: Super Eurobeat
description: Super Eurobeat is a form of Eurobeat music, which is a genre of electronic dance music that originated in Italy in the late 1980s. It is characterized by its fast tempo (usually around 160-180 BPM), heavy use of synthesizers, and catchy melodies. Super Eurobeat is a subgenre of Eurobeat that is even faster and more intense, with tempos ranging from 180-220 BPM. It is often used in anime and video game soundtracks, and is popular in Japan and Europe.

name: Turkish Death Metal
description: Turkish Death Metal is a subgenre of death metal that originated in Turkey in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its heavy, distorted guitar riffs, blast beats, and guttural vocals. The lyrics often focus on themes of death, violence, and religion. The genre has been influenced by traditional Turkish music, as well as by other extreme metal genres such as black metal and thrash metal. It has become increasingly popular in recent years, with bands such as Necrophagia, Cenotaph, and Mezarkabul gaining international recognition.

name: Kompa Gouyad

name: Hardtekk
description: Hardtekk is a subgenre of hardstyle music that originated in Germany in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its hard-hitting, distorted kick drums, aggressive synth leads, and distorted basslines. It is often associated with the rave and club scenes, and is often played at festivals and events. Hardtekk is known for its high energy and intense sound, and is often considered to be a more extreme version of hardstyle.

name: Polish Metalcore

It is characterized by a mix of metalcore and melodic death metal, with a focus on heavy breakdowns and aggressive vocals. name: Burmese Traditional
description: Burmese traditional music is a genre of music that has been passed down through generations in Myanmar (formerly known as Burma). It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the saung-gauk (a type of harp), the hne (a type of flute), and the pat waing (a type of drum). The music is often accompanied by singing and dancing, and is often used in religious ceremonies and festivals. It is a unique blend of Indian, Chinese, and Southeast Asian influences, and is known for its complex rhythms and melodic structures.

name: South African R&B

name: Lagu Iban
description: Lagu Iban is a traditional music genre from the Iban people of Sarawak, Malaysia. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the sape, gong, and drums, as well as its unique vocal style. The lyrics of Lagu Iban songs often tell stories of the Iban people's culture, history, and daily life. name: Borneo Traditional

name: Malaysian Traditional

name: Cambodian Traditional

It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the khim (a hammered dulcimer), the roneat (a xylophone-like instrument), the tro (a two-stringed fiddle), and the chapei (a long-necked lute). The music is often accompanied by singing and dancing, and is often used in ceremonies and festivals. It is a unique blend of traditional Khmer music and influences from other cultures, such as India and China.

name: Arpa Grande

The music is usually played in a fast tempo and is often accompanied by other instruments such as the guitar, violin, and accordion. The lyrics of Arpa Grande songs are usually about love, family, and life in general. The genre has been popular in Mexico since the early 20th century and is still widely enjoyed today.

name: Jazz Cover

Jazz covers can range from faithful renditions of the original song to completely new interpretations. name: Xenharmonic
description: Xenharmonic music is a genre of music that explores the use of microtonal intervals and scales. It is a type of experimental music that uses intervals smaller than the traditional semitone, such as quartertones, fifthtones, and even smaller intervals. Xenharmonic music often uses alternative tuning systems, such as just intonation, meantone, and other non-equal temperaments. It is a genre that is open to exploration and experimentation, and is often used to create unique and interesting sounds.

name: Ocean
description: Ocean music is a genre of music that is inspired by the sounds of the ocean. It typically features ambient, atmospheric, and dreamy soundscapes that evoke a sense of calm and relaxation. name: Lagu Sasak

It is characterized by its use of traditional Sasak instruments such as the suling (bamboo flute), gendang (drum), and rebab (stringed instrument). name: Musiikkia Lapista

name: Laulaja-lauluntekija
description: The Laulaja-lauluntekija (Finnish for "singer-songwriter") genre is a style of music that originated in Finland in the late 1960s and early 1970s. Karjalainen, Juice Leskinen, and Eino Grön.

name: Rakugo
description: Rakugo is a traditional Japanese musical genre that dates back to the Edo period (1603-1868). It is a form of comic storytelling, usually performed by a single storyteller (rakugoka) who sits on a stage and tells a story while using various vocal techniques and gestures. The stories are usually humorous and often involve puns and wordplay. The stories are usually accompanied by a shamisen, a three-stringed Japanese instrument. Rakugo is still popular today and is often performed in theaters and on television.

name: Uyghur Folk

Sacred Harp music is often performed in large gatherings, with singers arranged in a hollow square formation. The music is typically loud and energetic, and the singing is often accompanied by clapping and foot-stomping. It is characterized by its use of four-part harmony and its focus on spiritual themes. The music is often accompanied by a piano or organ and is typically performed in a church setting. The genre is often used to express the faith and beliefs of the church and to bring people closer to God.

name: Chanson Humoristique
description: Chanson Humoristique is a French music genre that combines elements of traditional French chanson with humorous lyrics. The genre is often characterized by its lighthearted, often satirical lyrics, which often poke fun at everyday life and social conventions. The music is typically upbeat and often features accordion, guitar, and other traditional French instruments. Chanson Humoristique is a popular genre in France and is often performed in cabarets and other live music venues.

name: Musique Tchadienne
description: Musique Tchadienne is a genre of music from Chad, a country in Central Africa. It is a mix of traditional African music, French influences, and modern pop and rock. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the n'goni, a four-stringed lute, and the calabash, a percussion instrument. It also features a variety of vocal styles, including call-and-response singing, and often incorporates elements of traditional African dance. Musique Tchadienne is popular throughout Chad and is often performed at weddings and other celebrations.

name: Humour Francais
description: Humour Francais is a genre of French music that is characterized by its humorous and satirical lyrics. It often uses irony and sarcasm to make fun of current events, politics, and social issues. The music is usually light and upbeat, often featuring accordion, guitar, and other traditional French instruments. It is often seen as a form of social commentary, and is popular among French-speaking audiences.

name: Kamba Pop
description: Kamba Pop is a genre of music that originated in Kenya. It is a fusion of traditional African rhythms and modern pop music. It is characterized by its upbeat tempo and catchy melodies. The lyrics often focus on themes of love, relationships, and social issues. Kamba Pop is popular among young people in Kenya and is often used in television and radio commercials.

name: Man's Orchestra
description: Man's Orchestra is a genre of music that originated in Japan in the late 1980s. It is characterized by its use of traditional Japanese instruments such as the shamisen, koto, and shakuhachi, as well as synthesizers and drum machines. The music is often upbeat and melodic, with a focus on creating a unique sound that blends traditional Japanese music with modern electronic elements. Man's Orchestra is often seen as a precursor to the J-pop genre, and has been influential in the development of many other Japanese music genres.

name: Czsk Hyperpop
description: Czsk Hyperpop is a genre of electronic music that originated in the Czech Republic and Slovakia. It is characterized by its upbeat, energetic sound, often featuring heavy bass and distorted synths. It is heavily influenced by EDM, trap, and hip-hop, and often incorporates elements of traditional Czech and Slovak folk music. It is often described as a mix of traditional and modern sounds, and is often seen as a way to express the unique culture of the region.

name: Czsk Emo Rap

The genre often features themes of depression, heartbreak, and loneliness. It is often characterized by its heavy use of synthesizers and electronic music elements. name: Rumeli Turkuleri
description: Rumeli Turkuleri is a traditional music genre from the Balkans, particularly Turkey. It is characterized by its upbeat rhythms and lively melodies, often featuring instruments such as the baglama (a stringed instrument), the darbuka (a hand drum), and the zurna (a double-reed wind instrument). The lyrics of Rumeli Turkuleri songs often tell stories of love, loss, and longing, and the genre is often used to express feelings of nostalgia for the past.

name: Korean Hyperpop

name: Thai Viral Pop

name: Tvog
description: TVOG (short for The Voice of Germany) is a German music genre that originated from the popular German television show of the same name. It is a mix of pop, rock, and soul music, and is characterized by its upbeat and uplifting sound. The genre is often associated with the show's contestants, who are usually aspiring singers and songwriters. TVOG songs often feature strong vocal performances and catchy melodies.

name: Czsk Viral Pop

name: Slovak Trap
